# awesome-openrouter

> Awesome list of apps that work with OpenRouter. OpenRouter provides access to 300+ AI Models through a single API.

## Links

- Repository: https://github.com/nirholas/awesome-openrouter
- Author: https://github.com/nirholas
- Full documentation: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nirholas/awesome-openrouter/main/llms-full.txt
